monsters.description: An ancient warrior encased in ice, brought to life by dark magic.

rooms.description: A vast hall where crystalline shards glitter underfoot. Light refracts in dazzling patterns.

rooms.description: A hidden room filled with ancient knowledge and forgotten lore.

rooms.description: A dark cavern with walls of solid ice. Your breath creates clouds in the frigid air.

rooms.description: Ancient tomes frozen in ice line the walls. Knowledge preserved for eternity.

rooms.description: A room filled with frozen treasures from a bygone era. Riches beyond imagination.

rooms.description: Deep within the glacier, ancient ice formations create a maze of frozen corridors.

rooms.description: A magnificent throne carved from a single massive glacier dominates the chamber. This is the heart of the frozen realm.

rooms.name: Ice Bridge
rooms.description: A narrow bridge of ice spans a bottomless chasm. One wrong step could be your last.
